channel.title: Please help ill do anything! plz!
channel.description:
ok everyone knows mopar has the red x at the top left
ok well i enabled all the java stuff and downloaded latest versions did everything i heard and it wont work'
but i still didnt do this
download the client? i dont understand what the client is lol ive been playin mopar for like 2 weeks :P
so can someone plzz help me or give me a link to the client!! plz!

item.description:
@elemental_awarness wrote:

lol k ill try it and btw it doesnt say download moparscape at the top right hand corner its just all black…[br][size=1]Posted on: August 17, 2007, 06:41:19 PM[/size][hr]ok i couldnt find it so i went to java.com and clicked show all download this is what came up’

a installer page

Name: Java™ SE runtime enviorment 6 update 2
Publisher : sun microsystems inc.

should i run the program to download?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 17, 2007, 06:44:26 PM[/size][hr]ohhhh lol sorry i thought it said download moparscape on moparisthebest.com like where the game loads never mind i found it

but idk like how to download it … its showing 3 places 2 go i went 2 every 1 and its confusing

=/ help??

item.dc:creator: @nd_w0t nd w0t
item.description:
@nd_w0t wrote:

Wow your all crap…

Download the right java i advise you to use, JDK 6.0…
Which can be found on google, search “JDK 6.0 DOWNLOAD”
The link should be “Java.sun”

And then after actually downloading it… This is a common mistake… Actually INSTALL the java… by clicking on the program when the download finishes
